_description: ‘But he sey soth he schal be schent’ — nine 12-line stanzas (ababababbcbc) with this refrain

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
Who so loueth endeles restÞis false world þen mot he
                    fle…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And elles when deþ þi doom schal dyȝthBut
                    þou say soþ þou schalt be schent
